H6119.def: = the back part of the foot of humans and animals below the ankle

H2554.def: = action by which humans behave aggressively towards other humans with which they have a relationship; ► usually in order to enrich themselves in one way or another

H3569.def: = member of the ethnic group ◄ that is regarded as descendants of Cush, son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}

H2015.def: = action by which humans turn their body around in order to face a different direction than before

H5785.def: = the thin layer of tissue forming the natural outer covering of the body of a person or animal

H5246.def: = one of the great cat family of about 2 m in length and of a yellowish brown color with black spots arranged in rosettes all over the body and the tail; ◄ Panthera pardus; ► hunts by stalking prey; ≈ symbol of violent danger

H2272.def: = spot on the skin; ≈ symbol of a condition that cannot be altered

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H3201.def: mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

H3190.def: = causative action by which humans cause objects to be in a better state of maintenance than before

H3928.def: = state in which animals have adapted themselves to the conditions of a certain environment

H7489.def: literally: to make (one's deeds) wrong; hence: = action by which humans behave in an evil or harmful way

H7179.def: = dry grass-like remnant of wheat or another grain crop following the harvest; this term possibly refers to two kinds of material, one being the remnant of the crop remaining in the ground, the other being the unwanted residue of stalks; ► only used for brick making; ≈ usually considered of little value and needing to be separated from the grain itself; maybe burned

H4057.def: = area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H1486.def: = specially marked object, such as a pebble or piece of pottery, ► used in order to decide questions

H4521.def: = one part of an object (or range of objects) that has been divided into several portions

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4055.def: = a generic word for clothing, which in certain contexts may denote a specific kind of clothes, such as someone's tunic or armor

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H8267.def: = state in which humans are not committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H7757.def: = the part of a coat or dress that hangs below the waist

H2834.def: = causative action by which humans, deities, or animals remove an object that thinly covers another object

H7036.def: = state which provokes disdain from the general public or from a specific category of people ◄ due to one's behavior or condition

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H5004.def: = action by which married humans have voluntary sexual intercourse with other humans who are not their husband or wife; ≈ often used as a metaphor for idolatry

H4684.def: =  action by which a horse utters a prolonged cry; ≈ sometimes associated with a man's desire for another man's wife

H2154.def: = a project or scheme as conceived in the heart or mind, which can be either bad or good

H2184.def: = action by which humans engage in non-sanctioned worship, ◄ described in terms of prostitution

H1389.def: = an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a {L:mountain<SDBH:הַר>}

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H8251.def: = an object that is regarded as unclean and therefore treated as utterly detestable

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H4970.def: = reference to an unknown point in time; ► normally used with the purpose of finding out which point in time is intended; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that this point of time may never arrive

H2891.def: = process by which an area or object becomes free from dirt, contamination and everything else that is not supposed to be present
